    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Classifier create(android.content.res.AssetManager assetManager,
                                java.lang.String modelFilename,
                                java.lang.String labelFilename,
                                int inputSize,
                                int imageMean,
                                float imageStd,
                                java.lang.String inputName,
                                java.lang.String outputName)
        Initialises a native TensorFlow model from the assets folder
        Parameters:
        assetManager - Application Asset Manager
        modelFilename - Filepath of GraphDef protocol buffer
        labelFilename - Filepath of label file for classifier
        inputSize - Input size, a square image of inputSize x inputSize is assumed
        imageMean - Assumed mean of the image values
        imageStd - Assumed std of the image values
        inputName - Label of the image input node
        outputName - Label of the image output node
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
